name: ComboboxItemIndicator
description:
Indicates whether the item is selected.
Renders a `<span>` element.

className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

style.detailedType:
| React.CSSProperties
| ((
    state: Combobox.ItemIndicator.State,
  ) => CSSProperties | undefined)
| undefined

keepMounted.description: Whether to keep the HTML element in the DOM when the item is not selected.

render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.
render.detailedType:
| ReactElement
| ((
    props: HTMLProps,
    state: Combobox.ItemIndicator.State,
  ) => ReactElement)

data-starting-style.description: Present when the indicator is animating in.

data-ending-style.description: Present when the indicator is animating out.
